title: Did Ferrison and Earles connect the fire department's data service during a wildfire?
subtitle: The firefighters in Santa Clara, California, revealed that they had been forced to buy a more expensive package of services because of the "mistake" company.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: Verizon and Earles limited Santa Clara County Fire Department's access to data by "battering" their services in the middle of a forest fire.
